Class Rectangle

java.lang.Object
shapes.Shape
shapes.Rectangle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Locatable
public class Rectangle extends Shape implements Locatable
Represents a rectangle shape with a location, width, and length.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Rectangle()
    Constructs a default Rectangle with width 1.0, length 1.0, white color, and location (0, 0).
    Rectangle(double width, double length, Color color, Point location)
    Constructs a Rectangle with the specified width, length, color, and location.

  • Constructor Details

    • Rectangle

      public Rectangle()
      Constructs a default Rectangle with width 1.0, length 1.0, white color, and location (0, 0).

    • Rectangle

      public Rectangle(double width, double length, Color color, Point location)
      Constructs a Rectangle with the specified width, length, color, and location.
      Parameters:
      width - the width of the rectangle
      length - the length of the rectangle
      color - the color of the rectangle
      location - the location of the rectangle
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if width or length is not finite or invalid input: '<' 0, or location is null
